definitions.definition: A picture, drawn or painted; a sketch.
definitions.example: a fine view of Lake George

definitions.definition: A virtual or logical table composed of the result set of a query in relational databases.
The part of a computer program which is visible to the user and can be interacted with

definitions.example: The video was viewed by millions of people.

definitions.definition: To regard in a stated way.
definitions.example: I view it as a serious breach of trust.
